page.title: 09Doctor and Nurse
page.content: Dr. McLean used to stay in Beechfield, Johnstonebridge and he had his surgery in a room in the house . Fourteen years ago he moved to Millhill on the other side of the Dual Carriageway. He had a prefab erected there for his surgery. Three old cottages were knocked into one for his house. As there is no dispensing chemist in Johnstonebridge Dr. McLean does all his own dispensing. This is a great benefit for the local people, especially those with no easy access to a chemist's shop in town. A district nurse comes round to help old people, mothers with babies and to examine children who are starting school.
